constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 109 (Wednesday, June 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. THOMPSON of California:
H.R. 4107.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I
[Page H3083]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: IRS Whistleblower Program Improvement Act of 2021
